snippet: Gunmen from a radical Muslim sect attacked a town hall in northeast Nigeria, killing at least 20 people who had gathered for a meeting of a Christian ethnic group, the police said.
abstract: Gunmen from radical Muslim sect Boko Haram attack a town hall in rural northeast Nigeria, killing at least 20 people who had gathered for a meeting of a Christian ethnic group.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen from a radical Muslim sect attacked a town hall in northeast Nigeria, killing at least 20 people who had gathered for a meeting of a Christian ethnic group, the police said.
